description: This next generation grid-backed woven fleece was engineered for simplicity and function, and contains 93% recycled content. It provides an unbeatable combination of warmth, stretch and breathability, making it the perfect midlayer for backcountry touring and any other high-exertion cold weather activity.
name: Outdoor Research Vigor Plus Fleece Jacket - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved, 93% Recycled Polyester, 7% Spandex, 75D Stretch Woven Fleece with Grid Interior
